title: Ancient Healing Acupuncture
cleaned_text: Chiropractor At EnWell chiropractic & Acupuncture, we combine the ancient art of Acupuncture and Chiropractic to empower and balance the body to achieve and maintain high quality of life. Every individual is unique so as your body and healing process. We provide individual care that achieves each patient's full potential and promotes a healthier life. CHIROPRACTOR AND CERTIFIED ACUPUNCTURIST IN PLANO, DR. TAKE HORII PROVIDES INDIVIDUALIZED CHIROPRACTIC, ACUPUNCTURE, NATURAL AND SPORTS THERAPY. CHIROPRACTOR AND CERTIFIED ACUPUNCTURIST IN PLANO, DR. TAKE HORII PROVIDES INDIVIDUALIZED CHIROPRACTIC, ACUPUNCTURE, NATURAL AND SPORTS THERAPY. CALL US 972.232.7488 FOR AN APPOINTMENT! [Fee Change Notice Effective October 1, 2022](http://www.enwellchiro.com/blog/2022/10/01/fee-change-notice-effective-october-1-2022/) Our office will be closed from 9/3/2023 to 9/6/2023 CHIROPRACTOR Dr. Take Horii, a Chiropractor, Certified Acupuncturist & Healer! His clinic is located in Plano, TX. Dr. Take Horii suffered from lower back injury from sports injury (Judo and Karate). The chiropractic care helped his back and overall health. [Read More](http://www.enwellchiro.com/doctor) MISSION Our mission is to help people thrive rather than just survive by correcting their underlying health imbalances through the natural healing methods. By harmonizing body, mind and spirit, our patients/clients awaken their potential and transform into a new perspective on life. [Read More](http://www.enwellchiro.com/enwell-chiropractic) APPROACH EnWell Chiropractic takes a natural, drug-free and holistic approach to help people. Our focus is upon treating the whole person rather than just symptom or disease. We spend enough time to figure out you and your unique health status, so that we can help achieving your goal for full health potential. [Read More](http://www.enwellchiro.com/our-approach) SERVICES Dr . Horii believes that combination of Chiropractic and Acupuncture treatment works the best.
